title: ENERGY BALANCE RESEARCH
description: Center for Children's Healthy Lifestyles and Nutrition at Children's Mercy Hospital Dr. Robin Shook, PI
cleaned_text: The Energy Balance Research Lab at Children's Mercy Kansas City is focused on gaining insight into regulation of adolescent metabolism. There are many factors that participate in overall energy balance within the body, and the goal of our research is to explore the role that these factors play in the energy balance framework.
